description:
Investing in property is a big step for most people - it is unlike any other transaction you will make and with hundreds of thousands of dollars at stake you want to ensure you do it right.

The property climb is suited towards foreigners looking to buy in New Zealand, first home buyers, or people who have been out of the market a while and want a refresher.

Whilst the specifics of this course are for the New Zealand market the theory and strategy behind it is applicable in every market around the world.

In this 7 part video series you will be taught the ins and outs of what you need to know about purchasing property. It has been designed for students who are starting from scratch and will use basic terminology and teach you the real estate jargon you will find once you hit the market.

Spanned over the space of 7 modules you will be taken through from how to decide what type of property you want to buy, how to finance that property, finding the deal, working with agents, what due diligence to perform and how to actually go unconditional, plus more

The modules are made up of 10 minute videos along with resources and homework tasks to help you adapt your learning into the market.

This course will give you the confidence and skills you require to safely purchase property in New Zealand.
title: Purchasing your first investment property
